column4: have you people considered what a disaster your choice of distribution nomenclature is?
seriously
ubuntu has GOT to be the worst name ever chosen from an accessability standpoint
your logo has a bunch of Us and Ns that look identical, just rotated
what the hell is a dislexic person going to do if he sees that?
is such a wonderfull handle
you can add them to a script in /etc/init.d/, chmod 770 (root owership) then update-rc.d scriptname defaults
No existing script to do it?
well I like to add a custom script
on Gentoo, you can `/etc/init.d/iptables save` when you have a good ruleset, and on restart (i.e. boot) it restores your iptables settings
firewall's are not really necessary with Ubuntu anyways :D
*rolls eyes*
especially when other computers use ubuntu as a router to get out the cable modem huh?
that's one example
why not just install Firestarter it has a script AND a GUI
yeah today
that's what backups are for :)
I could just reinstall the system
/home is its own partition (the Ubuntu devs can't figure out why they would want to do this) so I can easily erase / and start over
do you have a spare machine on your network with a gew gigs of free space ?
well you should check out mondo it's for backup up your system to cd or dvd drive.
